main event: Multiple pilots reported seeing bright lights and an unidentified flying object while flying over the North Pacific near Hawaii on July 13, 1959.
interesting points: Multiple reports from airline pilots confirmed the sighting of unidentified bright lights in the sky,The first sighting was by a captain of Pan American Airways who described the object as a bright light with a metallic luster,Other pilots reported seeing similar lights under the same conditions and timing,The lights were described as moving at a high rate of speed and making impossible maneuvers for known aircraft,The official investigation labeled the object as possibly a meteor or natural phenomenon.
sighted object: Bright white lights with a large light accompanied by smaller lights
